title: Telkomtelstra
text:
telkomtelstra is a <a href="telecommunication">telecommunication</a>s company based in <a href="Jakarta">Jakarta</a>, <a href="Indonesia">Indonesia</a>. It was formed as a joint venture between <a href="Telkom%20Indonesia">Telkom Indonesia</a>, the nation's largest <a href="Landline">fixed-line</a> operator, and <a href="Australian">Australian</a> <a href="Telephone%20company">telecommunications company</a>, <a href="Telstra">Telstra</a>. Telkomtelstra offers managed network services, WAN optimisation, managed <a href="cloud%20services">cloud services</a>, <a href="software%20as%20a%20service">software as a service</a>, infrastructure as a service, platform as a service, <a href="unified%20communications">unified communication</a> and collaboration services, managed <a href="Security%20service%20%28telecommunication%29">security services</a>, and <a href="professional%20services">professional services</a>. The <a href="joint%20venture">joint venture</a> was formed in October 2014, and has over 100 employees.
History.
The birth of telkomtelstra came from an initial meeting and <a href="Memorandum%20of%20understanding">MOU</a> between two companies, <a href="Telkom%20Indonesia">Telkom Indonesia</a> and Telstra, an Australian company. The joint venture agreement was finalized between the two companies’ parents on 29 August 2014. The idea was to select and jointly share specialised resources of the two companies in order to create a new joint venture to be the exclusive provider of network application services (NAS) to business clients in Indonesia, <a href="South-East%20Asia">South-East Asia</a>’s largest economy.
PT Teltranet Aplikasi Solusi (telkomtelstra) was established by notarial deed No. 36 in Jakarta. The deed of establishment was approved by the <a href="Justice%20ministry">Minister of Justice</a> of the Republic of Indonesia in his decision letter No AHU-31520.40.10.2014, dated October 27, 2014. Since its foundation, it has expanded to include a range of different services, and has been awarded “the most innovative partnership award” by the IDC.
Services Provided.
Telkomtelstra provides network application services across Indonesia, and is, per its agreement, the exclusive provider of these services in the country. As of today, the services they offer include:
Managed Network Services – Telkomtelstra provides management services for the communication networks of both <a href="Multinational%20corporation">multinational</a> and domestic companies.
Managed Cloud Services - Telkomtelstra offers on-demand services to companies via the <a href="internet">internet</a> from cloud systems as opposed to <a href="On-premises%20software">on-premises servers</a>.
Software as a Service - Also known as software on demand, telkomtelstra hosts subscription-based software services.
Unified Communication and Collaboration - Telkomtelstra helps companies overcome challenges by bringing all communications into one place, and providing communication services for personnel.
Managed Security Services - Services that aim to protect a company, and the sensitive information of customers from attacks and leaks.
Professional Services - Consultation services including project management and assessment.
